thread.title: Kohl’s: HUGE Savings on Kid’s Clothing = Tops, Skirts, Shorts & More Only $3.20 Each
thread.title_full: Kohl’s: HUGE Savings on Kid’s Clothing = Tops, Skirts, Shorts & More Only $3.20 Each

author: Angie (Sweet Sidekick)
title: Kohl’s: HUGE Savings on Kid’s Clothing = Tops, Skirts, Shorts & More Only $3.20 Each
text:
Through April 2nd, Kohl’s.com is offering up $10 off a $40 Kid’s Clothing and Shoes purchase when you use the code KIDSALE10 at checkout. Even sweeter, Kohl’s cardholders can use the code LUCKY30 to save 30% off their entire purchase AND the code FS4MARCH to score FREE shipping on every order (codes expire 3/26)! And, YES all of these codes can be combined!

Need new Spring/Summer kid’s clothes? Check out these Cardholder deals… Jumping Beans Tops, Skirts and/or Bottoms – Baby & Toddler sizes $6 each (reg. $12) – scroll down 
Buy 7 = $42
Use the codes KIDSALE10 and LUCKY30 and FS4MARCH 
Final Cost $22.39 shipped – only $3.20 each shipped!

Jumping Beans Tops, Skirts and/or Bottoms – Baby & Toddler sizes $7 each (reg. $12) 
Buy 6 = $42
Use the codes KIDSALE10 and LUCKY30 and FS4MARCH 
Final Cost $22.39 shipped – only $3.73 each shipped!

Jumping Beans Tops, Skirts and/or Bottoms – Girl & Boy sizes $8 each (reg. $16) 
Buy 5 = $40
Use the codes KIDSALE10 and LUCKY30 and FS4MARCH 
Final Cost $21 shipped – only $4.20 each shipped!
Not a Kohl’s cardholder? Save an extra 15% off your entire purchase with code SAVE15 at checkout (expires 3/26). Keep in mind that shipping starts at $8.95 for orders less than $75 OR opt for free in-store pickup if available.
